Synopsis: Removes Group Policy WMI filters based on specified criteria.
Description: This function removes WMI filters based on the provided GUIDs or names within the specified forest or domains. It retrieves WMI filters associated with the GPOs and removes them.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Remove-GPOZaurrWMI -Guid "12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012"
Description
-----------
Removes the WMI filter with the specified GUID.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Remove-GPOZaurrWMI -Name "TestWMIFilter"
Description
-----------
Removes the WMI filter with the specified name.
